data.name: 0001 (380.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …So? You were saying?

data.name: 0002 (380.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: By which you mean…?

data.name: 0003 (380.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Don't play dumb—why did you stop me earlier?

data.name: 0004 (380.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You didn't finish telling me earlier.

data.name: 0005 (380.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Ah! So I did—Do pardon my rudeness.

data.name: 0006 (380.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I was merely wondering…

data.name: 0007 (380.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Is Miss Suzumiya actually the type to be easily persuaded by others?

data.name: 0008 (380.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …What do you mean?

data.name: 0009 (380.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Although we've only known each other for a while, I've been analyzing her in my own way.

data.name: 0010 (380.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If I had to say, she may be the type that likes to solve everything by herself.

data.name: 0011 (380.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, that might be true.

data.name: 0012 (380.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If that's so, wouldn't imposing our own concl- usions on her have the opposite effect?

data.name: 0013 (380.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Observing her own evidence, assembling her deductions, and being led to her conclusions…

data.name: 0014 (380.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Only by doing so herself would Miss Suzumiya be fully convinced, don't you think?

data.name: 0015 (380.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Don't be so longwinded. In short she rejects all conclusions but her own?

data.name: 0016 (380.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I don't have the nerve to go that far I'm afraid.

data.name: 0017 (380.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: After all—I'm quite the timid person.

data.name: 0018 (380.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You have the nerve for insincere flattery all the time.

data.name: 0020 (380.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ummm… About that, couldn't the reverse also happen?

data.name: 0021 (380.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Suddenly, Asahina raised her hand. Couldn't the reverse happen—what might that mean?

data.name: 0022 (380.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Weeell, if you wanted to convince her, couldn't you lead her a certain way or something?

data.name: 0023 (380.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I was just considering the same thing.

data.name: 0024 (380.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Even if what we prepare is trickery, she may still be content.

data.name: 0025 (380.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Dangle the glimmering carrot of evidence in front of her face huh?

data.name: 0026 (380.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I suppose that's also one method to consider.

data.name: 0027 (380.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …One method to consider…

data.name: 0028 (380.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato—what do you think?

data.name: 0031 (380.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Surely you have at least an opinion?

data.name: 0032 (380.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Haruhi Suzumiya's decision is the conclusion. The process is negligible.

data.name: 0033 (380.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …Therefore guidance is effective.

data.name: 0034 (380.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In other words—Nagato has the same view as Koisumi and Asahina.

data.name: 0035 (380.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: To guide Miss Suzumiya's reasoning, arranging clues at every turn…

data.name: 0036 (380.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Most likely, it will require a high degree of teamplay, wouldn't you say?

data.name: 0037 (380.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I agree. What can an induvial accomplish on his own? Cooperation is paramount.

data.name: 0038 (380.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Alright, let's start moving in that direction. Where should we begin?

data.name: 0039 (380.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Information sharing is a maximum priority.

data.name: 0040 (380.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: All members knowing the counter-measure is essential.

data.name: 0041 (380.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's right. Be sure to share any "clues" you find while investigating.

data.name: 0042 (380.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Something that I don't know, someone else might know.

data.name: 0043 (380.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We quickly exchanged all the information we had with each other…

data.name: 0044 (380.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: About Haruhi
